Reviews.Title: “Nice, Friendly, CLEAN”
Reviews.Author: veronicade1
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by this one after my experience in Kissimmee. I DID NOT follow Trip Advisor's recommendations on this hotel after the glowing report on the crap-hole the week before but rather did other research. It was a clean place, lobby smells a bit weird but otherwise the room entrances are all indoors, the beds are clean, fresh and lovely. It's quiet, roomy and for the price, a great value. A bit removed from everything in Daytona but only by a few miles. It served its purpose and that was for a quiet night of rest.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Somerset West, Western Cape, South Africa
Reviews.Title: “Porter Family”
Reviews.Author: Stephen P
Reviews.Content: we had a great time staff very friendly,helpful always on top of things.Sandra advised us on transport around the area and also assisted in hiring a car for the family.We will certainly return here someday.Thank you again for making this a pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “It was super!”
Reviews.Author: BXDIVER
Reviews.Content: Stayed here overnight and my experience was excellent. My room seemed to have been renovated recently. It was clean and I felt safe. The price was a great value. I'll be back next time with the family.

Reviews.Title: “Great place,Great price”
Reviews.Author: likeitbald
Reviews.Content: I wanted a clean, cheep place to stay for a few days in Daytona Beach. This place fit the bill perfectly. The room was just as advertised, very clean, and quiet. The front desk staff were great, as was the housekeeping staff. I've stayed in a lot of places in Daytona Beach, but this is by far the best when it comes to cleanliness, rates, and staff. Everything is maintained in good working order, and it has a nice quiet pool out back to relax in. Kudos to all involved!

Reviews.Title: “Find Another Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: gordon61
Reviews.Content: Checked in last night, not having slept in two days and having hurt my knee a few hours before. Was given a second floor room (204). While trying to get my stuff upstairs, I couldn't get the elevator to work. The guy came over and pounded the button and I was able to get to my room. As soon as I walked in, the room smelled as if someone had peed all over the entryway floor. As it wasn't so bad further inside I ignored it and got ready for some sleep, choosing the far bed. Thought I'd watch TV for a few minutes as I dozed off, but something was wrong with it . . . at that point I wasn't going to complain. Slept really well for about twelve hours. Headed downstairs about 9:50 a.m. for some breakfast . . . couldn’t get the elevator to work. Finally found the stairway, and with my knee screaming at me, made it to the lobby. Breakfast ended at 9:00 a.m. (not 10:00 a.m. like everywhere else)! My fault for not checking beforehand, but still . . . Limped back up stairs. Called the front desk three times for a late checkout . . . no one answered, so I left a message on the manager’s voicemail. Over the next hour, I was threatened and harassed several times even though the front desk eventually got back to me and said the extra hour I needed was fine. To their credit, the elevator was working again when I left. Place is clean and looks fine, though I can't vouch for any of the amenities as I didn’t use them. Will be in Daytona for a few more days, but will not be spending them here!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price”
Reviews.Author: Jerry-retired
Reviews.Content: This Super 8 is a good value with nive rooms for a reasonable price. It is on Old Route 1. It is not in what you might say is Daytone Beach tourist area. It is far enough back from the street so that noise is a problem. You would have to drive to the beach if you wanted to use it. We would stay there again if it was an overnight stop on the way to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “A great find!”
Reviews.Author: Wanderingthrulife
Reviews.Content: What a find this was! We arrived hot, tired, and just wanting a good night's rest. This is a Super 8, not a five star resort. But it met every expectation we have for an excellent experience. The price was reasonable, the hotel and the rooms were clean and comfortable, and the staff was helpful and pleasant. We would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “"PATEL DOES IT AGAIN"”
Reviews.Author: Bill_Volmary_2004
Reviews.Content: Another flawless stay at this Super 8 during Bike week. Clean well appointed rooms. Great security......the only hotel I have ever stayed at where you have to state a reason to the front desk for visiting a room in a hotel where you are not a guest. Inside corridors, good secure parking, staff that goes out of their way to make sure you have an enjoyable stay. Breakfast was continental, with coffee, fresh fruit, cereal, bagels, toast, & sweet rolls. One of the best values in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience !”
Reviews.Author: Bill_Volmary_2004
Reviews.Content: Stayed hear during Biketoberfest . Ample parking for motorcycles & Tow vehicles. Good security, friendly helpful staff. Great location to attend the events from.One of the best Super 8's I have stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!”
Reviews.Author: Ben143
Reviews.Content: I loved the stay here! Everyone was very friendly, service was quick. The rooms were very clean, beds were very comfortable. I enjoyed my stay here with my friends, the area was quiet, not too disturbing. The pool was cleaned. I really loved the landscaping, it was very details and beautiful. Thank you Super 8 for making my stay a pleasure!!

Reviews.Title: “Super Clean and Super Friendly”
Reviews.Author: piresd
Reviews.Content: This hotel was one of the cleanliest places I have stayed. The staff and manager were very friendly and accommodating. I would highly recommend this peaceful property to anyone visiting or passing through Daytona Beach, Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Went to Daytona for a little Get away for a day!”
Reviews.Author: Diamondinduval904
Reviews.Content: Well me and john wanted to get away for a lil bit so we had his mom with us though and so she came along for our lil get away! We stayed at this super 8 off of exit 261 we asked how much a room was for a night, which it was like $79 for the jucuzzi suite and it was nice believe it or not! I wasnt exspecting the room to look as good as it did! So we had to send his mom to the store for a little bit to go SHOPPING... lol! But ya so we had fun alot of fun me and his mom got in the hottub and was chillen for a lil bit too!

Reviews.Title: “Not special, but ok”
Reviews.Author: Tapie
Reviews.Content: Rooms were ok: clean and spacious. Location is poor: near a small airport so it's pretty noisy, because of the planes which are flying pretty low. It's about 20 minutes drive to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: aaronbond
Reviews.Content: Considering the room only cost $67.50 per night, this place was well worth the money. Only a 5 minute drive from the beach, this hotel was very clean, the staff were friendly and the room catered for all our needs. There is a swimming pool which was of decent size and appeared to be well looked after. For the price, I would definitely recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: lynncook568
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this motel for the last three years that we have vacationed at Daytona Beach. They are excellent. The staff is so friendly and helpful. The rooms are very clean. We have never had any problems with this motel. If you want a good experience on the beach, pick this motel.

Reviews.Title: “very good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: patrickCalfornia
Reviews.Content: it is a very beautiful place to stay, very quiet and spacious rooms. nice breakfast in the morning with bagels coffee muffins juice The rooms were very cleaned and the staff was very friendly to us. Me and my wife had a very wonderful time staying at the motel. Its situated right in the heart of daytona beach. I would recommend this motel to my friends when they visit daytona beach.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Daytona Beach
HotelInfo.Address: 1242 South Ridgewood Ave, US 1 South of Daytona International Speedway, Daytona Beach, FL
